title: 1.1 ROS 2 Architecture & DDS - The Robotic Nervous System
description: Welcome to Module 1: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2). In this chapter, we delve into the fundamental architecture of ROS 2, understanding how it forms the communication backbone for complex robotic systems, especially humanoid robots. We will explore the core concepts of the Data Distribution Service (DDS) and how it facilitates real-time, decentralized communication between various components.
